Package com.mygdx.game.Node

Class Node

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.Node.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AgilityTestNode, GlobalPenaltyNode, NormalNode, PenaltyNode, StarNode
public abstract class Node extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Node on the game board.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Node

      public Node(int mapX, int mapY, boolean north, boolean east, boolean south, boolean west, com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets)
      Constructor for Node.
      Parameters:
      mapX - X position
      mapY - Y position
      north - indicates if there is a node North on the map
      east - indicates if there's a node East on the map
      south - indicates if there's a node South on the map
      west - indicates if there's a node West on the map
      assets - AssetManager to use

    • Node

      public Node(int mapX, int mapY, com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets)
      Simpler constructor which assumes there are no linked nodes.
      Parameters:
      mapX - X position
      mapY - Y position
      assets - AssetManager to use

  • Method Details

    • loadTextures

      public void loadTextures(com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets)
      Load/reload textures. Required after deserialization.
      Parameters:
      assets - AssetManager to use

    • activate

      public void activate(Player player, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, boolean hardmode)
      Runs when the Node is landed on.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player who landed on the Node
      batch - the SpriteBatch to draw on
      hardmode - whether the gameState is in hard mode

    • activate

      public boolean activate(Player player, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin skin, GameBoard board, boolean hardmode)
      Run by the GameBoard when the Node is landed on. Used to allow interaction with the GameBoard. To delay passing of a turn, this function can return true to indicate that it will control starting the next turn.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player who landed on the Node
      batch - the SpriteBatch to draw on
      stage - the GameBoard's Stage
      skin - the GameBoard's Skin
      board - the GameBoard executing the function
      hardmode - whether the gameState is in hard mode
      Returns:
      true if the Node will handle changing the turn, false otherwise

    • draw

      public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch)
      Draw the Node.
      Parameters:
      batch - the Batch to draw with

    • getReachable

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> getReachable(int distance, String prevNodeID, Map<String,Node> nodeMap)
      Get all Nodes reachable from this Node, exactly distance nodes away from it. Returns the whole path from the current node to the reachable node.
      Parameters:
      distance - EXACT distance from this node to match
      prevNodeID - previous node taken. Used to prevent going backwards
      nodeMap - Map of nodes
      Returns:
      the list of paths to reachable nodes

    • setGreen

      public void setGreen()
      Nodes are set green when they are reachable for the current player

    • setGray

      public void setGray()
      Nodes are set gray when they were on the previous path taken by the player

    • setNoColor

      public void setNoColor()
      After movement, all reachable nodes must have their original color restored.

    • getID

      public String getID()
